path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Lemon Swap Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.LemonSwap: Experiments/contracts/Lemon Swap Full Smart Contract Security Audit/LemonSwap

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function excludeMultipleAccountsFromFees() uses a loop to exclude multiple accounts from fees and will be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.

findings.title: swapAndLiquify issue
findings.description: The function swapAndLiquify() do not returns after emitting zero event on “(tokens > balanceOf(address(this)))”.
